reviewText: This DVD helps when I use the book because it is easy to understand how to sew and make quilt .
Bought for my Mom.  She seemed to like it.
I enjoy Eleanor Burns books with her DVD's, she make's it fun to watch and try out different styles - quicker, easier ways with her method.

this DVD is a companion to the book they go hand and hand and guide you through the creation of all the quilts and recipes.
however the DVD sells for only $29.95 retail in most quilt stores and directly from Quilt in a Day.

I find that all of her books are helpful.  The detailed pictures are really wonderful for beginners and those of us with a little more experience.  The spiral binding is great too. I don't have to wrestle with the book while I am sewing.

This video is very well put together. It basically shows all you need to know to learn how to quilt. It is well worth the money. It would have cost me over $50.00 dollars just for one day of learning at the community collage here to learn just a little bit. Thanks!!!
